verses.verse: And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and looked <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and, behold, Esav <S%H6215><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and with him four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men <S%H376><s%>. And he divided <S%H2673><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the children <S%H3206><s%> unto Leah <S%H3812><s%>, and unto Rachel <S%H7354><s%>, and unto the two <S%H8147><s%> handmaids <S%H8198><s%>.

And he put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the handmaids <S%H8198><s%> and their children <S%H3206><s%> foremost <S%H7223><s%>, and Leah <S%H3812><s%> and her children <S%H3206><s%> after <S%H314><s%>, and Rachel <S%H7354><s%> and Yosef <S%H3130><s%> hindermost <S%H314><s%>.

And he passed over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before them <S%H6440><s%>, and bowed himself <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times <S%H6471><s%>, until he came near <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to his brother <S%H251><s%>.

And Esav <S%H6215><s%> ran <S%H7323><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to meet him <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and embraced <S%H2263><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him, and fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on his neck <S%H6677><s%>, and kissed him <S%H5401><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: and they wept <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And he lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the women <S%H802><s%> and the children <S%H3206><s%>; and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Who are those <S%H428><s%> with thee? And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, The children <S%H3206><s%> which 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath graciously given <S%H2603><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%>.
Then the handmaidens <S%H8198><s%> came near <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, they and their children <S%H3206><s%>, and they bowed themselves <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%>.

And Leah <S%H3812><s%> also with her children <S%H3206><s%> came near <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and bowed themselves <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%>: and after <S%H310><s%> came <S%H5066><s%> Yosef <S%H3130><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8738><s%> and Rachel <S%H7354><s%>, and they bowed <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%> themselves.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, What meanest thou by all this drove <S%H4264><s%> which I met <S%H6298><s%> <S%H8804><s%>? And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, These are to find <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8800><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of my lord <S%H113><s%>.
And Esav <S%H6215><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I have <S%H3426><s%> enough <S%H7227><s%>, my brother <S%H251><s%>; keep that thou hast unto thyself.

And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Nay, I pray thee, if now I have found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in thy sight <S%H5869><s%>, then receive <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my present <S%H4503><s%> at my hand <S%H3027><s%>: for therefore I have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%>, as though I had seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and thou wast pleased with me <S%H7521><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, I pray thee, my b'rakhah <S%H1293><s%> that is brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8717><s%> to thee; because 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath dealt graciously with me <S%H2603><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and because <S%H3605><s%> I have <S%H3426><s%> enough <S%H3605><s%>. And he urged <S%H6484><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him, and he took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it.
And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Let us take our journey <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and let us go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and I will go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before thee.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, My lord <S%H113><s%> knoweth <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8802><s%> that the children <S%H3206><s%> are tender <S%H7390><s%>, and the flocks <S%H6629><s%> and herds <S%H1241><s%> with young <S%H5763><s%> <S%H8802><s%> are with me: and if men should overdrive <S%H1849><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them one <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, all the flock <S%H6629><s%> will die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

Let my lord <S%H113><s%>, I pray thee, pass over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> his servant <S%H5650><s%>: and I will lead on <S%H5095><s%> <S%H8691><s%> softly <S%H328><s%>, according as <S%H7272><s%> the cattle <S%H4399><s%> that goeth before me <S%H6440><s%> and the children <S%H3206><s%> be able to endure <S%H7272><s%>, until I come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto my lord <S%H113><s%> unto Seir <S%H8165><s%>.

And Esav <S%H6215><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Let me now leave <S%H3322><s%> <S%H8686><s%> with thee some of the folk <S%H5971><s%> that are with me. And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, What <S%H4100><s%> needeth it? let me find <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of my lord <S%H113><s%>.
So Esav <S%H6215><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> on his way <S%H1870><s%> unto Seir <S%H8165><s%>.

And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Sukkot <S%H5523><s%>, and built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him an house <S%H1004><s%>, and made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> booths <S%H5521><s%> for his cattle <S%H4735><s%>: therefore the name <S%H8034><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> is called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Sukkot <S%H5523><s%>.

And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Shalem <S%H8004><s%>, a city <S%H5892><s%> of SH'khem <S%H7927><s%>, which is in the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>, when he came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> from Padanaram <S%H6307><s%>; and pitched his tent <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>.

And he bought <S%H7069><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a parcel <S%H2513><s%> of a field <S%H7704><s%>, where he had spread <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his tent <S%H168><s%>, at the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Hamor <S%H2544><s%>, SH'khem's <S%H7927><s%> father <S%H1><s%>, for an hundred <S%H3967><s%> pieces of money <S%H7192><s%>.
And he erected <S%H5324><s%> <S%H8686><s%> there an altar <S%H4196><s%>, and called it <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Elelohe-Yisra'EL <S%H415><s%>.
